amendment.description: To authorize per diem payments under comprehensive service programs for homeless veterans to furnish care to dependents of homeless veterans.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2760 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2760 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Heller. (consideration: CR S7622; text: CR S7622) To authorize per diem payments under comprehensive service programs for homeless veterans to furnish care to dependents of homeless veterans.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2760 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Heller.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2760 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
